alert.note: Alert for Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 8:24PM EST until March 10 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 2 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Northern Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 2 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may start as snow prior to daybreak, and a brief period of freezing rain is expected during the morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
